For those who crash after starting the game but hearing some music for the opening credits I found a solution that worked for me.  I changed my playback quality down to 16 bit 44khz and started the game and it worked perfectly fine.  I changed it to the lowest 24bit 44khz and it still works fine.  Apparently the problem is an audio device compatibility problem.
